original_text: Crowds of people were going out into the wilderness. They wanted John to baptize them. He told them, ‘You are like dangerous snakes! God is angry. You are trying to run away from him. But he will soon punish people like you.
korean_text: 요한이 세례 받으러 나아오는 무리에게 이르되 독사의 자식들아 누가 너희에게 일러 장차 올 진노를 피하라 하더냐

sentences.original_text: Crowds of people were going out into the wilderness
They wanted John to baptize them
You are trying to run away from him
But he will soon punish people like you
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그는 곧 너희 같은 사람들을 벌할 것이다
